subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: In relief of a superb Mike Pelfrey, four pitchers held the Marlins scoreless until the 11th inning, when Omir Santos singled home Gary Sheffield with the winning run.
snippet: In relief of a superb Mike Pelfrey, four pitchers held the Marlins scoreless until the 11th inning, when Omir Santos singled home Gary Sheffield with the winning run.
